code: @Test public void testOneRouteRefNoOnExceptionAndDLCErrorHandler() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:handled").expectedMessageCount(0).     template.sendBody("direct:foo", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testOneRouteRefOnExceptionAndDLCErrorHandler() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:handled").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:bar", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
